content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 Euros per month would be fair. The apartment is really nice and the location is perfect.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euros is too low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm looking for a higher price to reflect the value of the property. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 600 Euros per month? I think this is a good price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 600 Euros is more in line with what I had in mind. However, I'm still open to considering a higher offer if you believe the apartment is worth more. Would you be willing to go up to 650 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month. This is a fair price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 650 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
